## IndentOptions interface

describe a single level of indent

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IndentOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [count](./standard-node.indentoptions.count.md) | <code>number</code> | the number of the value to use for a single level of indent default of 1 |
|  [level](./standard-node.indentoptions.level.md) | <code>number</code> | the number of times to indent default of 1 |
|  [value](./standard-node.indentoptions.value.md) | <code>string</code> | the value to use for the indent default of four spaces |
